title: Software Engineer II-UI Developer
description:
***hackajob** 
 is collaborating with
 **J.P. Morgan** 
 to connect them with exceptional tech professionals for this role.*
**Job Description**
 You‚Äôre ready to gain the skills and experience needed to grow within your role and advance your career ‚Äî and we have the perfect software engineering opportunity for you.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer II at JPMorgan Chase within the Commercial \\& Investment Bank Payments Technology team, you will be part of an agile team dedicated to enhancing, designing, and delivering software components for the firm's cutting\\-edge technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable manner. In your role as an emerging member of the software engineering team, you will execute software solutions by designing, developing, and troubleshooting various components within a technical product, application, or system, while acquiring the skills and experience necessary for growth in your position.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Executes standard software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting
* Writes secure and high\\-quality code using the syntax of at least one programming language with limited guidance
* Designs, develops, codes, and troubleshoots with consideration of upstream and downstream systems and technical implications
* Applies knowledge of tools within the Software Development Life Cycle toolchain to improve the value realized by automation
* Applies technical troubleshooting to break down solutions and solve technical problems of basic complexity
* Gathers, analyzes, and draws conclusions from large, diverse data sets to identify problems and contribute to decision\\-making in service of secure, stable application development
* Learns and applies system processes, methodologies, and skills for the development of secure, stable code and systems
* Adds to team culture of diversity, opportunity, inclusion, and respect


**Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 2\\+ years applied experience
* Hands\\-on experience in UI/front\\-end development
* Strong proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and TypeScript
* Extensive experience with one or more modern JavaScript frameworks (React)
* Translate UI/UX design wireframes into high\\-quality code.
* Understanding of cross\\-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them
* Experience across the whole Software Development Life Cycle
* Exposure to agile methodologies such as CI/CD, Application Resiliency, and Security
* Emerging knowledge of software applications and technical processes within a technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, machine learning, mobile, etc.)


**Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Exposure to cloud technologies
* Experience with UI testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress, etc.).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and build tools
* Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus
* Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments

title: R & D Test Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we‚Äôll give you what you need to make it happen. It won‚Äôt always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you‚Äôll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

  

  

  

**Your role and responsibilities:**
 In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute to ABB‚Äôs success with technology, software, product, and system development. Each day, you will identify and implement innovative solutions to relevant problems. You will also showcase your expertise by providing ideas and by being able to work both independently and as a part of a Research \\& Development (R\\&D) team.
   

  

 The work model for the role is:
   

  

 This role is contributing to the
 **Motion Business Drive Products Division in Bangalore, India**
**You will be mainly accountable for:**
* Identifying testing needs, executing test and driving the implementation of product and system test automation
* Participating in framing test strategy, selecting right tools, frameworks and executing automation of product testing in line with standard practices
* Being responsible for the test infrastructure, including virtual and physical test environment Searching for opportunities to improve test quality by identifying improvements and sharing of best practices
* Ability to write strong test cases by being creative and exploring challenging test scenarios
* Living ABB‚Äôs core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business


**Qualifications for the role:**
* BE or B.Tech in Electrical / Instrumentation / Electronics \\& Telecommunication engineering
* Minimum 3 to 7 years of experience in test automation and testing industrial automation software
* Good knowledge in drive engineering and testing
* Knowledge in programming, according to IEC 61131\\-3, Python and CODESYS
* Knowledge on manual and automation testing concepts, test automation tools and techniques Certification in ISTQB foundation level would be added advantage
* Having basic understanding on Azure DevOps, Jenkins, CI/ CD process and C\\# language
* Should have excellent problem\\-solving skills, ability to work both in team and independently


**More about us:**
 ABB Drive Products is a technology leader serving industries, infrastructure and machine builders with world\\-class drives and soft starters. With our products, global scale and local presence, we help our customers to improve energy efficiency, productivity and safety. Our people and culture are the foundation of our success. We all together make the difference for our customers every day.
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Software Engineer III - Java/React Full Stack
description:
***hackajob** 
 is collaborating with
 **J.P. Morgan** 
 to connect them with exceptional tech professionals for this role.*
**Description**
**JOB DESCRIPTION**
 Push the limits of what‚Äôs possible with us as an experienced member of our Software Engineering team.
   

  

 As an Experienced Software Engineer at JPMorganChase within the Global Technology team, you serve as member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. Depending on the team that you join, you could be developing mobile features that give our customers and clients more control over how they bank with us, strategizing on how big data can make our trading systems quicker, creating the next innovation in payments for merchants, or supporting the integration of our private and public cloud platforms.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Participates in, design and develop scalable and resilient systems using Java to contribute to continual, iterative improvements for product teams
* Executes software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting
* Creates secure and high\\-quality production code and maintains algorithms that run synchronously with appropriate systems
* Produces or contributes to architecture and design artifacts for applications while ensuring design constraints are met by software code development
* Gathers, analyzes, synthesizes, and develops visualizations and reporting from large, diverse data sets in service of continuous improvement of software applications and systems
* Identifies hidden problems and patterns in data and uses these insights to drive improvements to coding hygiene and system architecture
* Contributes to software engineering communities of practice and events that explore new and emerging technologies
* Adds to team culture of diversity, opportunity, inclusion, and respect


**Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 3\\+ years applied experience
* Hands\\-on practical experience in system design, application development, testing and operational stability
* Proficient in coding in Java, SpringBoot, ReactJS languages
* Proficient in SQL/NoSQL databases
* Exposure to AWS cloud technologies
* Overall knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle
* Understanding of agile methodologies such as CI/CD, Application Resiliency, and Security
* Knowledge of software applications and technical processes within a technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, etc.)


**Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Exposure to AI technologies


**Your Role Level**
 JPMorganChase is looking to hire Software Engineers at Software Engineer II and Software Engineer III levels. A determination will be made on placement for successful candidates based on the results of a skills\\-based assessment which applicants will be asked to complete during the hiring process, as well as, the candidate interview. The assessment will evaluate ability to perform basic coding and systems design responsibilities. For the Software Engineer II level, the role requires the ability to understand advance features of a coding language, design a viable system, and solve functional problems through basic language applications. For the Software Engineer III level, the role requires a higher level of proficiency and the ability to function independently, including the ability to use and explain advance features of a coding language, design systems across technologies and platforms, solve functional and non\\-functional problems through an application of language best practices, as well as, the ability to assess issues broadly, identify alternative or innovative solutions, collaborate effectively, and provide guidance to others.

title: Associate Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
As a leading financial services and healthcare technology company based on revenue, SS\\&C is headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut, and has 27,000\\+ employees in 35 countries. Some 20,000 financial services and healthcare organizations, from the world's largest companies to small and mid\\-market firms, rely on SS\\&C for expertise, scale, and technology.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Required Qualifications
   

  

* 1‚Äì3 years in a full\\-time SDET/QA Automation role.
* Solid understanding of STLC and quality best practices.
* Hands\\-on programming in JavaScript (preferred) or Python/C\\#.
* Automation experience with one or more: Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, Appium, WebdriverIO (Wdio); API automation using Frisby/Jasmine/Mocha or similar.
* Exposure with UI and API test automation (must\\-have).
* Exposure to Jenkins and Docker (pipelines, containers, agents).
* Familiarity with Node.js/React applications and modern web testing strategies.
* Strong communication and cross\\-functional collaboration skills.
* Willingness to learn new tools/technologies as needed.
* Functional testing experience, including test design and execution.
* Ability to write/optimize SQL queries and stored procedures for data validation.


 Nice\\-to\\-Have
   

  

* PowerShell /JavaScript scripting for test/ops automation (log parsing, environment setup).
* Experience designing automation frameworks from scratch (architecture, reporting, utilities).
* Knowledge of mocks/stubs, contract testing, and test data management.
* CI fundamentals: parallelization, artifact management, test reporting (e.g., Allure/Extent), flaky test quarantine.
* Experience with cloud CI agents and containerized test execution.


 Technical Stack You Will Touch Here
   

  

* Languages: PowerShell, Javascript, C\\#, Python
* UI: Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, Wdio
* Mobile: Appium
* API: Jasmine/Mocha, REST/JSON
* Build/CI: Jenkins, Docker
* App Context: Node.js / React
* Data: SQL (queries, stored procedures)


 Unless explicitly requested or approached by SS\\&C Technologies, Inc. or any of its affiliated companies, the company will not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee\\-based recruitment services.
   

  

 SS\\&C Technologies is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any applicant for employment or employee on the basis of race, color, religious creed, gender, age, marital status, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other classification protected by applicable discrimination laws.

title: Software Engineer, AVP
description:
Join us as a Software Engineer
   

  

* This is an opportunity for a driven Software Engineer to take on an exciting new career challenge
* Day\\-to\\-day, you'll build a wide network of stakeholders of varying levels of seniority
* It‚Äôs a chance to hone your existing technical skills and advance your career
* We're offering this role at associate vice president level


 What you'll do
   

  

 In your new role, you‚Äôll engineer and maintain innovative, customer centric, high performance, secure and robust solutions. You‚Äôll be working within a feature team and using your extensive experience to engineer software, scripts and tools that are often complex, as well as liaising with other engineers, architects and business analysts across the platform.
   

  

**You‚Äôll Also Be**
* Producing complex and critical software rapidly and of high quality which adds value to the business
* Working in permanent teams who are responsible for the full life cycle, from initial development, through enhancement and maintenance to replacement or decommissioning
* Collaborating to optimise our software engineering capability
* Designing, producing, testing and implementing our working code
* Working across the life cycle, from requirements analysis and design, through coding to testing, deployment and operations


 The skills you'll need
   

  

 You‚Äôll need at least eight years of experience in software engineering, software design, architecture, and an understanding of how your area of expertise supports our customers.
   

  

**You‚Äôll Also Need**
* Experience of working with development and testing tools, bug tracking tools and wikis
* Experience in Java, Microservices, AWS and SQL
* Experience of DevOps, Testing and Agile methodology and associated toolsets
* A background in solving highly complex, analytical and numerical problems
* Experience of implementing programming best practice, especially around scalability, automation, virtualisation, optimisation, availability and performance

description:

**Responsibilities**
* Develop robust and scalable software solutions using Java Spring Boot and Angular JS to meet business requirements.

title: AWS DevOps Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**
 Join our dynamic team as a Senior Software Engineer where you will leverage your extensive experience in software development and cloud technologies to drive innovation and efficiency. You will be instrumental in designing developing and deploying cutting\\-edge solutions using a variety of tools and platforms. Your expertise will contribute to the enhancement of our services impacting both the company and our clients positively.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and implement high\\-quality software solutions using SOA Microservices and Python to meet business requirements and improve system performance.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design and deploy applications on AWS platforms including Lambda ECS and EKS ensuring scalability and reliability.
* Utilize Jenkins Docker and Kubernetes to automate deployment processes enhancing the efficiency and consistency of software releases.
* Lead the integration of testing frameworks such as Cucumber and Junit to ensure robust and reliable software delivery.
* Oversee the use of Gitlab and GITHUB for version control ensuring code integrity and facilitating seamless collaboration among team members.
* Implement and maintain continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines using Jenkins and AWS DevOps streamlining the development lifecycle.
* Conduct code reviews and utilize SONARQUBE to maintain high code quality and adherence to industry standards.
* Develop and execute shell scripts and Groovy scripts to automate routine tasks improving operational efficiency.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers fostering a culture of learning and innovation within the team.
* Engage in problem\\-solving and troubleshooting to resolve complex technical issues ensuring minimal disruption to services.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications aligning development efforts with business goals.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies applying this knowledge to drive continuous improvement in software development practices.
* Contribute to the enhancement of consumer lending solutions leveraging domain expertise to deliver value\\-added services.


**Qualifications**
* Possess extensive experience in SOA Microservices and Python demonstrating a strong ability to develop scalable applications.
* Demonstrate proficiency in AWS services including Lambda ECS and EKS with a proven track record of successful deployments.
* Exhibit expertise in CI/CD tools such as Jenkins and AWS DevOps showcasing the ability to streamline development processes.
* Have a solid understanding of version control systems like Gitlab and GITHUB ensuring effective collaboration and code management.
* Show experience in using testing frameworks like Cucumber and Junit ensuring high\\-quality software delivery.
* Display knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes with experience in containerization and orchestration.
* Experience in consumer lending domain is a plus providing valuable insights into industry\\-specific challenges.

* Orchestrating the end\\-to\\-end deployment process, ensuring that all aspects of go\\-live are considered

* Validate product functionality and security requirements

* 
* More about you

* Experience in Angular, Node and React JS would be an advantage
